title: Geometric Sans
content:
I might be missing something obvious, but it seems like none of the usual suspects quite apply – I'd appreciaty any input!

Font: 

 Real

author: Philae

comments.content:
Here's a try: du Carrois, Ralph/Real Text  
No Source. By Erik Spiekermann & Ralph du Carrois. spiekermann.com & carrois.com 2014.  
 [http://www.edenspiekermann.com/people/ralph-du-carrois](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200041/http:/www.edenspiekermann.com/people/ralph-du-carrois)  
 [![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200041im_/http:/i.imgur.com/XG0EEXA.jpg " imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200041/http:/imgur.com/XG0EEXA)

You can get a free text weight of Real if you buy the book for which it was designed, Erik Spiekermann’s “Hello, I’m Erik”:  
 [http://www.carrois.com/en/real/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200041/http:/www.carrois.com/en/real/ "http://www.carrois.com/en/real/")
That seems to be it — many thanks to both of you!
